screenshots.description: Payroll Table main interface showing employee list with status indicators, currency tabs (AED selected), and summary totals
screenshots.path: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File
content_highlights: Status indicators: Active, Inactive, Inactive/EOS Processed
Currency selection tabs: AED, CNY, INR, EUR, SAR, KWD, USD, HKD

screenshots.description: Payroll Cycle selector dropdown showing July 2024 cycle with date range format
Payroll table columns showing comprehensive salary component breakdown and settlement information
content_highlights: Salary components: Basic Salary, Allowances, Add-on, Bonus, Commission, Overtime, Share Bonus
Deduction tracking: Work Expenses, Net Deductions, Social Security Contribution
Settlement columns: Gross Pay, Total Net Pay, Processed Net Pay, Unpaid amounts
Column headers clearly labeled for transparency

summary.notes: Screenshots document the primary user interface for End of Service feature access and payroll data display. Employee profile-specific EOS features require separate navigation session.
